data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in North-East, Botswana to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of North-East, Botswana
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of North-East to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in North-East, Botswana to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Jesus, please give the apostles in North-East, Botswana a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of North-East prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of North-East.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.section_summary:
the state of North-East, Botswana has a population of 90,000.

We estimate North-East has 7,431 people who might know Jesus, 51,532 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 31,037 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in North-East, Botswana, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.
